title: Can we disable chroma skins when they come out?
body: I'm kind of not interested in having purple zeds and orange lucians running around the map and confusing me in the middle of teamfights. I was wondering if we could get the option to just... you know, have the regular colours the champions are supposed to have.

replies.body:
Because colours help me identify champions in my peripheral vision when in the middle of a hectic team fight. Trying to fight a black zed one game and then next game zed is a bright orange, then the next game he's green, doesn't really help with the whole instant identification thing.

Maybe it wouldn't matter for you, but for some it does. Especially at higher ranked ladders, where every little bit counts. Not trying to force this on everybody, I just want it as a toggled option for those that care.

Black {{champion:238}}  would be annoying to deal with, I admit. "WHICH ONE IS THE SHADOW?!?"

{{champion:238}} ?{{champion:238}} ?
Readability is something we consider when creating chromas - especially when gameplay is a factor.
